jcr:content.jcr:title: G403 Wired - Honey Badger
jcr:content.seoDescription: Logitech G403 gaming mouse is designed for casual or constant gaming with a comfortable shape, rubber grips for better control, 1ms report rate, and programmable RGB lighting.
jcr:content.seoPageTitle: Logitech G403 Wired Programmable Gaming Mouse

media_tile.text: With rubber grips on the left and right sides to give you added control, the G403 was made to mold to your hand for long-lasting comfort during gameplay. With a lightweight, ergonomically designed body, G403 brings together supreme comfort, quality, and durability.

media_tile_654806920.text: G403 communicates at up to 1,000 reports per second, 8x faster than standard mice. This means when the mouse is moved or clicked the onscreen response is virtually instantaneous.

media_tile_777233576.text: Become more accurate than you’ve ever been before. The G403 features the renowned PMW3366 gaming mouse sensor, used by esports pros worldwide. Exceptionally precise and consistent, it gives you the confidence of quicker responses and more accurate targeting.

media_tile_842265300.text: With a lightweight construction and included optional 10-gram weight, you have the choice to tune the mouse to your preference.

media_tile_200728518.text: LIGHTSYNC technology provides next-gen RGB lighting that synchronizes lighting with your games and content. Customize from a full spectrum of approximately 16.8 million colors and synchronize lighting animations and effects with your other Logitech G devices. Customize it all quickly and easily using Logitech Gaming Software (LGS).

media_tile_200728518_1655643158.text: Mechanical button tensioning uses metal springs to help keep the left and right mouse buttons primed to click, reducing the force needed. The left and right buttons are also separate, which adds to the enhanced consistency for exceptional click feel and response.

media_tile_200728518_437751444.text: With onboard memory, you can take your settings with you wherever you go. Save your settings to the memory on the mouse and use your settings on any PC without needing additional software or login to use them.Advanced features require Logitech Gaming Software, available for download at logitechg.com/downloads

media_tile_200728518_2091337663.text: G403 can be used with preset programming or fully configured to match your preferences. Advanced users can use LGS to configure the 6 programmable buttons to simplify in-game actions and quickly execute complex tasks.Advanced features require Logitech Gaming Software, available for download at logitechg.com/downloads

media_tile_200728518_1531901764.text: On-the-fly DPI shifting that lets you program and switch between up to 5 sensitivity settings from 200 to 12,000 DPI, for pixel-precise targeting to lightning-fast maneuvers with a single click.Advanced features require Logitech Gaming Software, available for download at logitechg.com/downloads

_x0034_.text: Max. acceleration: > 40 GTested on Logitech G240 Gaming Mouse Pad

_x0035_.text: Max. speed: > 400 IPSTested on Logitech G240 Gaming Mouse Pad

_x0032_.text: PTFE Feet: 250-km rangeTested on Logitech G240 Gaming Mouse Pad

_x0035_.text: Internet access for Logitech Gaming Software (optional)
